description: This Java class configures Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings for a Spring Boot application. It defines a bean that registers CORS policies to allow cross-origin requests from localhost:3000, which is typically used for frontend development, with all methods and headers permitted.

classes.name: CorsConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that defines CORS settings for the application.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Creates and registers a CORS filter with the specified configuration allowing all methods and headers from localhost:3000.
